# The `LegalizerInfo.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Interface for Targets to specify which operations they can successfully select and how the others should be expanded most efficiently.

<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// base-type. For example a &lt;2 x s8&gt; add could be implemented as a &lt;2</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The (vector) operation should be implemented by splitting it into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// sub-vectors where the operation is legal. For example a &lt;8 x s64&gt; add</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// might be implemented as 4 separate &lt;2 x s64&gt; adds. There can be a leftover</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// if there are not enough elements for last sub-vector e.g. &lt;7 x s64&gt; add</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will be implemented as 3 separate &lt;2 x s64&gt; adds and one s64 add. Leftover</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// types can be avoided by doing MoreElements first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/legalizeactions/#a834a0e3032e20fe88a0c931e8f246654a123b973f813232425a88cae2ef685a5a"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/legalizeactions/#a834a0e3032e20fe88a0c931e8f246654a123b973f813232425a88cae2ef685a5a">FewerElements</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The (vector) operation should be implemented by widening the input</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// vector and ignoring the lanes added by doing so. For example &lt;2 x i8&gt; is</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalizeactionstep/#aa24f30dfb027fd8d99607a723476154d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalizeactionstep/#aa24f30dfb027fd8d99607a723476154d">LegalizeActionStep</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legacylegalizeactionstep">LegacyLegalizeActionStep</a> Step)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">      : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalizeactionstep/#aafa2d5d36d517a05b8f11d2c96a86de7">TypeIdx</a>(Step.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalizeactionstep/#aafa2d5d36d517a05b8f11d2c96a86de7">TypeIdx</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalizeactionstep/#aaa08931577871b9d39ac4ec02e02291b">NewType</a>(Step.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalizeactionstep/#aaa08931577871b9d39ac4ec02e02291b">NewType</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Step.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legacylegalizeactionstep/#a695d326dc57441ca67a0c3615ce5f7a5">Action</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::Legal:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::Legal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::NarrowScalar:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::NarrowScalar;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::WidenScalar:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::WidenScalar;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::FewerElements:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::FewerElements;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::MoreElements:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::MoreElements;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::Bitcast:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::Bitcast;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::Lower:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::Lower;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::Libcall:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::Libcall;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::Custom:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::Custom;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::Unsupported:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::Unsupported;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    case LegacyLegalizeActions::NotFound:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">      Action = LegalizeActions::NotFound;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the action definitions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It is an error to request an opcode that has already been requested by the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// multiple-opcode variant.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizeruleset">LegalizeRuleSet</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizerinfo/#a32539827696dafee94ee79c3321b4245">getActionDefinitionsBuilder</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the action definition builder for the given set of opcodes. Use this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to define the action definitions for multiple opcodes at once. The first</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// opcode given will be considered the representative opcode and will hold</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the definitions whereas the other opcodes will be configured to refer to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the representative opcode. This lowers memory requirements and very</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// slightly improves performance.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It would be very easy to introduce unexpected side-effects as a result of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this aliasing if it were permitted to request different but intersecting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// sets of opcodes but that is difficult to keep track of. It is therefore an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// error to request the same opcode twice using this API, to request an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// opcode that already has definitions, or to use the single-opcode API on an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// opcode that has already been requested by this API.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizeruleset">LegalizeRuleSet</a> &amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizerinfo/#a32539827696dafee94ee79c3321b4245">getActionDefinitionsBuilder</a>(std::initializer&#95;list&lt;unsigned&gt; Opcodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizerinfo/#a8cbf5ed977f7c1b9afa880ce73fa6f70">aliasActionDefinitions</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpcodeTo, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpcodeFrom);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Determine what action should be taken to legalize the described</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction. Requires computeTables to have been called.</Highlight></CodeLine>
